message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"together; at the same time","sentence":"我们一起走路。","image_prompt":"A group of three people walking side by side on a quiet road. They are close to each other, clearly moving together in the same direction. The landscape is calm but subtly eerie, with gentle ruined buildings along the sides, overgrown with nature, and the soft colors and slight disintegration characteristic of soft apocalypse animation.","sentence_translation":"We walk together."}
